meanings.definition: In a way that is designed for efficiency and comfort in the working environment.
meanings.sent1: She adjusted her chair ergonomically to prevent back pain.
meanings.sent2: The office desk was set up ergonomically to promote good posture.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to sit ergonomically on the computer chair, mimicking its owner.
meanings.sent4: His workflow was ergonomically optimized, allowing him to work without strain.
meanings.sent5: The new keyboard was ergonomically shaped, fitting perfectly to his hands.

meanings.definition: Relating to the design of equipment or devices that fit the human body's natural movements and capabilities.
meanings.sent1: The ergonomically designed chair supported his back during long hours of work.
meanings.sent2: She preferred using ergonomically shaped tools to avoid wrist strain.
meanings.sent3: The ergonomically friendly mouse made clicking and scrolling a breeze.
meanings.sent4: His backpack was ergonomically crafted, distributing weight evenly on his shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The ergonomically curved handle of the mug felt comfortable in her grip.
